(:action hunt ; Hunt and prepare a resource
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?agent ?location)
        (or
            (and (not (has_resource ?agent ?resource)) (is_food ?resource))
            (and (not (prepared ?resource)) (is_tool ?resource))
        )
    )
    :effect (and
        (or
            (and (has_resource ?agent ?resource) (is_food ?resource))

(:action carve ; Transform a material or entity by using a tool
    :parameters (?agent - entity ?material - object ?tool - instrument)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?material ?location)
        (at ?tool ?location)
        (not (transformed ?material))
    )
    :effect (and
        (transformed ?material)
    )
